text:
EXCLUSIVE: @CityofCRiowa Mayor Hart shares what it will take to lift Cedar Rapid's mask mandate.

I asked Hart what he would say to @IAGovernor about her decision to lift to the state's mask mandate. #COVID19 #vaccine #Iowa #MaskUpIA 

FULL STORY👉https://t.co/fvKmPMa1IC https://t.co/dhV3ZtD9FC
